name: GoCD
desc: Continuous delivery server specializing in advanced workflow modeling and visualization
tags: Software Development - Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment

options.name: environment
options.desc: Additional environment variables to be passed to the gocd-server process. As a base environment, gocd-server receives NIX_PATH from environment.sessionVariables, NIX_REMOTE is set to “daemon”.

options.name: extraGroups
options.desc: List of extra groups that the “gocd-server” user should be a part of.

options.name: extraOptions
options.desc: Specifies additional command line arguments to pass to Go.CD server’s java process. Example contains debug and gcLog arguments.

options.name: group
options.desc: If the default user “gocd-server” is configured then this is the primary group of that user.

options.name: initialJavaHeapSize
options.desc: Specifies the initial java heap memory size for the Go.CD server’s java process.

options.name: listenAddress
options.desc: Specifies the bind address on which the Go.CD server HTTP interface listens.

options.name: maxJavaHeapMemory
options.desc: Specifies the java maximum heap memory size for the Go.CD server’s java process.

options.name: packages
options.desc: Packages to add to PATH for the Go.CD server’s process.

options.name: port
options.desc: Specifies port number on which the Go.CD server HTTP interface listens.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: sslPort
options.desc: Specifies port number on which the Go.CD server HTTPS interface listens.

options.name: startupOptions
options.desc: Specifies startup command line arguments to pass to Go.CD server java process.

options.name: user
options.desc: User the Go.CD server should execute under.

options.name: workDir
options.desc: Specifies the working directory in which the Go.CD server java archive resides.
